theme: We unlocked a new dimension with full audio support, a massive video model expansion, and a sleek frontend redesign.

arcs.headline: The platform found its voice
arcs.summary: We launched a comprehensive audio suite, including ElevenLabs Text-to-Speech, ElevenMusic for generation, and OVH Whisper for transcription, all integrated into the API and UI.

arcs.headline: Video and Image generation leveled up
arcs.summary: A massive influx of creative models arrived, including LTX-2, Grok Video, Imagen 3 & 4, and Flux 2 Dev, giving creators unprecedented visual tools.

arcs.headline: A unified, polished interface
arcs.summary: We overhauled the frontend with a fresh redesign, merged the standalone Docs directly into the Play page for easier integration, and improved the account dashboard.

arcs.headline: Agents helping agents
arcs.summary: We launched Polly (our Discord bot) to bridge chat with GitHub, and rolled out seamless integration for OpenClaw to help users build their own autonomous agents.

arcs.headline: Hardening the infrastructure
arcs.summary: From migrating Mistral to OVHcloud to simplifying the balance API and adding economic dashboards, the backend got faster and more transparent.

changelog_md:
## Week of Feb 5-11, 2026

### üîä Audio Revolution
- **ElevenLabs Integration**: Added high-quality Text-to-Speech (v3) and `elevenmusic` for generating tracks up to 5 minutes long.
- **Whisper Transcription**: Introduced Speech-to-Text capabilities via the OVH Whisper Large V3 model.
- **Audio API**: New endpoints and permission controls specifically for audio models.

### üé® Creative Suite Expansion
- **Video Generation**: Added **LTX-2**, **Grok Video**, and **Imagen 3** video capabilities.
- **New Image Models**: Integrated **Imagen 4**, **Flux 2 Dev**, and optimized **Klein/Sana** models for better stability.
- **Text Models**: Upgraded to **Claude Opus 4.6** and added **Qwen-character** for roleplay scenarios.

### üíÖ UX & Frontend Polish
- **Unified Play & Docs**: Merged the documentation directly into the Play page‚Äîcopy live API code without switching tabs.
- **Redesign**: A fresh look for the header, authorization pages, and theme bar.
- **OpenClaw**: Launched a dedicated landing page and auto-setup script for the OpenClaw agent framework.

### ü§ñ Polly & Community
- **Polly Discord Bot**: A new intelligent assistant bridging our Discord community with GitHub development.
- **Smart Search**: Upgraded Polly to use OpenAI embeddings for faster, more accurate answers.

### ‚öôÔ∏è Infrastructure & Fixes
- **Performance**: Migrated Mistral to OVHcloud and moved the AI gateway to a custom domain to eliminate timeouts.
- **Billing**: Simplified the balance API and introduced internal dashboards for platform economics.
- **GSoC**: Updated documentation and project pages for Google Summer of Code participants.

- #8072: feat: add elevenmusic model with duration-based billing
- #8068: feat: add OVH Whisper speech-to-text transcription

- #8130: feat: merge Docs page into Play page Integrate section
- #8078: Add Polly Discord Bot
- #8167: feat: auto-install OpenClaw and auto-onboard in setup script
- #8001: Add api.airforce models: Imagen 3 & Grok Imagine Video
- #8004: Upgrade claude-large from Opus 4.5 to Opus 4.6
- #8124: fix: remove unstable flux-2-dev, add qwen-character
- #8118: feat: economics dashboards
- #8053: fix: move Portkey gateway to custom domain
- #8026: [PATCH]: GSOC HMR Page route change top scrollheight location
